title: 정보 강조하기
description: 정보 강조하기을 연습합니다. INFORMATION-EMPHASIS 패턴을 활용하여 고급 영어 표현을 익힙니다.
examples: What matters is that we learn from mistakes.
The point is to save time.
The fact is that we are not ready.
learning_points: emphasis 관련 고급 표현과 실용적 활용

sentences.en: What matters is that we learn from mistakes.
The point is to save time.

sentences.kr: 사실은 우리가 준비가 안 되어 있다는 것입니다.
sentences.en: The fact is that we are not ready.

sentences.kr: 다르게 말해보면 더 많은 자원이 필요합니다.
sentences.en: Let me put it this way, we need more resources.
The key is to maintain quality.
The issue is that we lack budget.
What matters most is customer satisfaction.

sentences.kr: 진실은 우리 모두 노력이 필요하다는 것입니다.
sentences.en: The truth is that we all need to work harder.
